abstract:
Good Golly Laura looks so much like the French actress Audrey Tautou who played Amelie Poulain in the famous film AMELIE!
I like the shorts with the little design all over - now that's what I call slightly quirky.  Brighter colours would make it really quirky but a pleasant eye catcher.  Is you hip size a  s e c r e t  Jay?
OMG you mean when I go to Paris later this year nothing will be on sale. Wow 😮 ok 😫sounds like I will need a second job when I return home.
Stinky Santa 🤣 - Laura a) awesome name b) tres Audrey Tautau
